text: Phir kya tum us waqt maujood thay jab Yakub is duniya se ruksat ho raha tha? Usne marte waqt apne bacchon se pucha: “ bacchon! Mere baad tum kiski bandagi karoge?” un sab ne jawab diya : “ hum usi ek khuda ki bandagi karenge jisey aap ne aur aapke buzurgon Ibrahim, Ismail, aur Ishaq ne khuda maana hai aur hum usi ke muslim hain”
